title: Home | Charlotte, NC | RS Chinese Herbs & Acupuncture
description: RS Chinese Herbs & Acupuncture in Charlotte, North Carolina, offers the very best in acupuncture services.
cleaned_text: At RS Chinese Herbs & Acupuncture, our goal is to provide, through acupuncture and oriental medicine, the best possible holistic health care. We not only target the symptoms of an illness but also its source. We seek to help our patients heal and alleviate them from physical and emotional suffering while preserving their health and preventing them from having further ailments. With extensive training and clinical experience in acupuncture and traditional Chinese medicine, we have helped patients in Charlotte for over 15 years.
